plagiarismChecker.title: Text Similarity Review
plagiarismChecker.subtitle: Compare your documents against indexed sources to generate similarity indicators. Reports are provided for informational purposes only.
plagiarismChecker.step1Desc: Submit your document in PDF, DOC, DOCX, or TXT format for analysis.
plagiarismChecker.step2Desc: Your text is compared against available indexed sources.
plagiarismChecker.step3Desc: Download a report showing similarity indicators and matched text segments.
plagiarismChecker.sourceCoverageDesc: Documents are compared against indexed academic papers, journals, publications, and web content. Coverage depends on available sources.
plagiarismChecker.detailedReportsDesc: Reports highlight matched text segments with source references and similarity percentages for your review.
plagiarismChecker.fastProcessingDesc: Documents are typically processed within a reasonable timeframe. Processing times may vary.
plagiarismChecker.privacyFirstDesc: Documents are processed securely. Users may delete documents after processing.
plagiarismChecker.privacyDesc: Documents are processed in a secure environment. Your documents are not shared with other users or added to any public database. You can delete your documents at any time after processing.
plagiarismChecker.ctaDesc: Upload your document to generate a similarity report for your review.

aiContentDetection.title: Content Analysis Indicators
aiContentDetection.subtitle: Understand how content analysis works and how to interpret indicator reports. These indicators are provided for informational purposes only.
aiContentDetection.howItWorksDesc: Our system analyses writing patterns and generates indicators to support your content review process. These indicators are advisory only.
aiContentDetection.patternAnalysisDesc: The system analyses writing patterns, sentence structures, and linguistic features to generate content indicators.
aiContentDetection.probabilityIndicatorsDesc: Reports include probability-based indicators presented as advisory information for your review.
aiContentDetection.contextualInsightsDesc: Reports highlight sections with relevant indicators and provide context for your manual review.
aiContentDetection.privacyProtectedDesc: Documents are processed securely. Users may delete documents after processing.
aiContentDetection.whatIndicatorsShowDesc: Content analysis results are presented as probability percentages. These percentages are indicators for review purposes only and are not measures of certainty. Interpretation is your responsibility.
aiContentDetection.factor1: Technical or specialised vocabulary may influence results
aiContentDetection.factor2: Formal writing styles may show different patterns
aiContentDetection.factor3: Heavily edited text may affect indicator outputs
aiContentDetection.factor4: Writing style variations may influence results
aiContentDetection.recommendedApproachDesc: Use content indicators as one part of your review process. Apply human judgment when reviewing results. Indicators do not constitute verification or certification.
aiContentDetection.student1: Develop your own voice and writing style
aiContentDetection.student4: Review relevant guidelines for your context
aiContentDetection.educator1: Use indicators as one reference among many
aiContentDetection.educator2: Apply human judgment to all reviews
aiContentDetection.educator4: Do not rely solely on automated indicators
aiContentDetection.ctaDesc: Generate content analysis indicators to support your document review process. Results are for informational purposes only.

similarityReport.title: Understanding Similarity Reports
similarityReport.subtitle: Learn how to read, interpret, and use similarity reports to improve your academic writing and ensure proper attribution of sources.
similarityReport.overallScoreDesc: A clear percentage indicating the total amount of content that matches other sources, helping you understand your document's originality at a glance.
similarityReport.highlightedMatchesDesc: Text passages that match other sources are clearly highlighted, making it easy to identify areas that may need revision or additional citations.
similarityReport.sourceAttributionDesc: Each match includes a link to the original source, allowing you to verify the content and add proper citations where needed.
similarityReport.detailedBreakdownDesc: View similarity percentages broken down by source, helping you understand which sources have the most overlap with your document.
similarityReport.interpretingDesc: Understanding what different similarity percentages mean for your document.
similarityReport.lowSimilarityDesc: Generally acceptable for most academic submissions. May include common phrases and properly cited quotations.
similarityReport.moderateSimilarityDesc: Review highlighted sections to ensure proper citations. Some revision or paraphrasing may be beneficial.
similarityReport.higherSimilarityDesc: Careful review recommended. Ensure all sources are properly cited and consider paraphrasing where appropriate.
similarityReport.understandingDesc: It's important to understand that similarity is not the same as plagiarism. Similarity reports identify matching text, but matched content may include:
similarityReport.understanding2: Common phrases and terminology in your field
similarityReport.understandingNote: The report is a tool to help you review and improve your document, not a definitive judgment of academic integrity.
similarityReport.ctaDesc: Upload your document and receive a detailed similarity report to help improve your academic writing.

install.title: Install PlagaiScans
install.subtitle: Install our app for quick access and a better experience
install.installedDesc: PlagaiScans is installed on your device. You can access it from your home screen.
install.androidStep2: Tap "Install app" or "Add to Home screen"
install.fallbackMessage: The install option will appear automatically when available. You can also bookmark this page for quick access.
install.benefit1: Quick access from your home screen

maintenance.title: Under Maintenance
maintenance.defaultMessage: We are currently under maintenance. Please check back later.
maintenance.apology: We apologize for the inconvenience. Our team is working to restore services as quickly as possible.

guestUpload.title: Guest Upload
guestUpload.subtitle: Upload your document for plagiarism checking
guestUpload.invalidLinkDesc: This link is invalid or expired
guestUpload.createAccount: Want to check documents? Create an account to get started.
guestUpload.createAccountDesc: Create an account to upload more documents
guestUpload.uploadSuccessDesc: Your document is now in the queue and will be processed soon.
guestUpload.dropFiles: Drop files here or click to upload
guestUpload.emailNotificationsDesc: You'll receive an email at {{email}} when your documents are ready

paymentSuccess.verifyingDesc: Please wait while we confirm your payment...
paymentSuccess.successDesc: Your credits have been added to your account

resources.title: Resources & Learning Center
resources.subtitle: Educational articles, guides, and tips to help you understand academic integrity and improve your writing.
resources.readyToCheckDesc: Apply what you've learned and verify your document's originality with Plagaiscans.

academicIntegrity.title: Academic Integrity
academicIntegrity.subtitle: Understanding the principles of honest scholarship and responsible content creation.
academicIntegrity.whatIsDesc1: Academic integrity refers to the ethical standards and practices that guide honest scholarship. It encompasses the values of honesty, trust, fairness, respect, and responsibility in academic work.
academicIntegrity.whatIsDesc2: For students, researchers, and content creators, maintaining academic integrity means producing original work, properly attributing sources, and avoiding misrepresentation of ideas or data.
academicIntegrity.whatIsDesc3: Similarity checking tools can support academic integrity by helping users identify areas that may need additional citation or rephrasing before submission.
academicIntegrity.honestScholarshipDesc: Presenting your own work truthfully and acknowledging the contributions of others through proper citation and attribution.
academicIntegrity.fairAssessmentDesc: Ensuring that academic evaluation is based on authentic work, creating a level playing field for all participants.
academicIntegrity.educationalValueDesc: Understanding that the learning process itself is valuable, and that shortcuts undermine personal growth and knowledge acquisition.
academicIntegrity.professionalStandardsDesc: Developing habits of integrity that translate into professional ethics and responsible conduct in future careers.
academicIntegrity.howWeHelpDesc: Similarity checking tools are designed to help users review their work before submission, identifying areas that may need attention.
academicIntegrity.clearReportsDesc: Reports highlight text that matches indexed sources, helping users identify areas that may need citation or rephrasing.
academicIntegrity.educationalApproachDesc: Use reports as a learning tool to understand proper attribution practices and improve your writing skills.
academicIntegrity.improvementGuidanceDesc: Review matched segments to ensure proper citation, paraphrasing, and original analysis in your work.
academicIntegrity.citation1: Cite all sources using your required citation style
academicIntegrity.citation2: Use quotation marks for direct quotes
academicIntegrity.citation3: Paraphrase ideas in your own words while citing the source
academicIntegrity.citation4: Include a complete bibliography or reference list
academicIntegrity.original1: Develop your own thesis and arguments
academicIntegrity.original2: Use sources to support, not replace, your analysis
academicIntegrity.original3: Review your work for proper attribution before submission
academicIntegrity.original4: Seek guidance from instructors when unsure about citation requirements
academicIntegrity.ctaDesc: Use our similarity checking tool to review your work and identify areas that may need additional citation or revision.
